heading: Areas of Specialization
subheading: Dr. Zhang has vast knowledge in combining acupuncture and Chinese herbal medicine to treat various conditions

cards.title: Women's Health & Fertility
cards.description: Dr. Zhang specializes in women's health and fertility problems, including infertility, IUI and IVF support, high FSH, miscarriage prevention, egg quality improvement, implantation support, endometriosis, and premature ovarian failure.

High effective and unique skill in acute and Chronic low back pain, neck and shoulder pain, Osteoarthritis , Tension headaches and migraines, Sciatica, Post-surgical pain, Fibromyalgia , Frozen shoulder, all joints pain.
cards.title: Pain and Sports Injuries

cards.description: Extensive experience treating anxiety, allergies, stress, migraines, inflammatory bowel disease, cancer support treatment, hypertension, arthritis, and chronic pain conditions.
cards.title: Internal Chronic Conditions

cards.description: Specialized training in treating neuromuscular paralysis, Parkinson's disease, neurodegenerative conditions, stroke rehabilitation, and numbness.
cards.title: Neurological Conditions

cards.description: Dr. Zhang received specialty training in pediatric acupuncture in China and has helped many children, including those with autism. She is the author of "Pediatric Acupressure."
cards.title: Pediatric Acupuncture
